alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 30 at 6:28AM HST until January 30 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING FOR THE BIG ISLAND SUMMITS OF MAUNA KEA AND MAUNA LOA... .The wind advisory has been extended through this afternoon for the Big Island summits. ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Winds 45 to 55 mph with localized gusts to 65 mph. * WHERE...Big Island Summits. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking difficult. These winds can forcefully open doors and damage hinges or slam doors shut, possibly causing injuries.
info.instruction: Consider postponing travel to the summits until conditions improve. If you must travel to the summits, use extra caution walking and driving. Be careful opening or closing doors.
